name: Touhou PHANToM - X - BLADE (Alpha A)
description:
Touhou PHANToM - X - BLADE is a fangame a game starring Youmu of Touhou Project. An adventure game that began to be developed in October 2021. The adventures of Youmu and her half-phantom, Myon, in an 2D universe with many great places to explore.

Story:

At any moment in Gensokyo, it appeared  five mysterious coloured Ying Yang Orbs. These unknown objects was inside Magic Forest, but all the mysterious orbs was stolen. Nobody know these orbs. Youmu Konpaku and her half-phantom goes to adventure find the five mysterious orbs in gigantic places with various areas and rooms existing in this vast world called Gensokyo. Secrets are waiting for you.

Gameplay:

This game is a 2D Action-platformer, which mixes a little Hack'n'Slash and some Metroidvania style. Youmu can attack using her Roukanken (in future Alpha Hakurouken will be available) and her half-phantom can shoot different projectiles. Youmu possesses greater strength than her half-phantom, but her range is short. While her half-hantom is the opposite. (This Alpha still doesn't have everything mentioned in this description).

In this Alpha just have Magic Forest Stage avaliable.

Minimum Requirements:

CPU: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or greater

Operational System: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11

RAM: 1GB

Hard Disk: 128 MB free

(Gamepad compatibility is not avaliable yet).

I'm aware of a few bugs, most notably the Pause menu bug. But report bugs in my twitter DM. In the next Alpha I want to deliver a good game with comfortable gameplay for our players.
